quest.name: Skin in the Game
journal: Guildmaster Geva appears to be upset. Though it would probably be wiser not to, perhaps you should see what is troubling her.

It would seem that an Ul'dahn merchant named Aymar has set about defaming the guild. He claims that the toad leather he purchased is of inferior quality. Geva intends to resolve the matter with a display of authentic craftsmanship, and bids you craft and present to her a circle of high-quality toad leather.
Your toad leather passes Geva's rigorous inspection. Present it to Aymar at the Carline Canopy, so that he may compare his purchase with an item of confirmed Fen–Yll provenance.

After gazing upon your magnificently crafted toad leather, Aymar realizes that the goods he purchased were not produced by the Leatherworkers' Guild. Return to Geva and reassure her that the guild's good name is not in danger.

Geva is delighted by the surpassing quality of your work─though it sounds as if she was even more delighted by the groveling apology of the Ul'dahn merchant. She is, however, deeply resentful of the unknown “Angrbotha” upstarts who she believes mean to exploit the guild's reputation. You cannot help but shiver when she adds that she would like very much to meet the leatherworker responsible for the whole affair...

※The next leatherworker quest will be available from Geva upon reaching level 30.
objectives: Present a circle of toad leather to Geva.
Present the toad leather to Aymar.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Ohhh, he'll pay! I swear by Louisoix's beard, I'll tear the skin from his─

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Ahem! Forename─it's good that you are here. Listen to this!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: An Ul'dahn merchant has set about blackening the guild's good name. He claims that some toad leather we sold him is─and I quote─“of inferior quality”!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Aye, you heard me─inferior! The gall of the man! I swear to you, I would be the very soul of contrition if his allegations were proven true, but they just seem so...so utterly...unthinkable!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Why, he claims the leather was unevenly tanned and still reeking of toad slime! It's clear that whoever made that leather didn't know the first thing about working with toad skin.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Which means that there's no way in the seven hells that it came from us! Believe me when I tell you, Forename, I'll be deep in the cold, hard ground before I permit such shoddy work to bear our name.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: The very thought of some two-gil hide mangler claiming to represent this guild makes me want to... Gaaah!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Ahem. Ultimately, it doesn't matter that this isn't our handiwork. If our customers begin to suspect that our standards are slipping, and that we are not showing our materials the proper respect, our good name will be lost, and our many years of hard work will have been for naught.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: We cannot let that happen. Though I am certain we have done no wrong, we need to make this right.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: We'll settle this with a display of authentic craftsmanship. Prepare a circle of high-quality toad leather and bring it to me for inspection. Understood?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Increasing an item's quality during synthesis improves the chance that the resulting product will be of a higher grade (HQ).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Prepare a circle of high-quality toad leather and bring it to me immediately. I want this matter resolved as soon as possible.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Heh heh heh...this will do nicely, Forename.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: You clearly understand the unique properties of toad skin and how best to harness them.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: This leather is sturdy, flexible, and completely free of unpleasant odors.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: There is but one thing left to do.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: I want you to take this toad leather, march down to the Carline Canopy, and shove it in this Aymar's face! Show the impertinent fool what real Fen–Yll quality looks like!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Completely and utterly unacceptable! Shame on Fen–Yll and their vainglorious claims! <spit> How could anyone call this rubbish “toad leather”!?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: About time one of you charlatans showed up! What is this, more toad leather!? I demanded a full refund, not more of your─

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Your... Wait, is this...?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: By the Twelve, I have never seen such exquisite toad leather! This would make an excellent belt or bag...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Consigned to oblivion, this tag.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Am I to understand that you are a producer of Fen–Yll goods? ...And you bring this to me...by special order of the legendary Geva herself!? What in the world is the meaning of this?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: ...I am most terribly sorry, good ladysir. When the merchant told me it was Gridanian leather, I naturally assumed that this “Angrbotha” was somehow affiliated with Fen–Yll.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: I should have known it was too good to be true. “A fraction of the time, a fraction of the price,” he said. Well, I certainly got what I paid for.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: I mean, I had never even heard of Angrbotha before, but everyone knows that Gridania is famous for─

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: No, no more excuses. It is my responsibility as a merchant to evaluate the supplier, and my own damn fault that I purchased an inferior product.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Reputation is everything in this world, and I fear I have unjustly besmirched your guild's. And yet, despite all that, the great Geva saw fit to gift me this exquisite leather...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: Well, I too have a reputation to uphold! This gesture cannot go unanswered.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT
dialogue.text: That the guild should be so generous as to correct my misconceptions in this manner is marvelous and humbling in equal measure. You have my word that my partners in Ul'dah will learn of your guild's exemplary service!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Excellent work, Forename! That bastard Aymar felt so appallingly guilty, he rushed over here to beg my forgiveness in person. I have witnessed some groveling in my time, but his was a truly masterful display! Bowing, stuttering, sniveling─it had it all!

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Oh, how I wish you had seen it, Forename. A proud Ul'dahn merchant, humbled by a circle of toad leather. You've improved more than I thought.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Now all we have to do is find out who's making this “Angrbotha” dross. Our contrite friend said that he had been told it was a new Gridanian brand, but no one here has heard of it.

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: New Gridanian brand... <snort> It's obvious they mean to capitalize on our good name. I'd like to meet the man who made that toad leather...

dialogue.name: GEVA
dialogue.text: Actually, Forename... Should you happen across him on your travels, I'd consider it a personal favor if you would flay the skin from his back and make me a pair of soles, so that I can grind him into the dirt every single day!
